catalog_item.display_value: Copy of Request\Revoke GAF\Other Share Access

sys_update_version.name: catalog_ui_policy_63a5eaffdb783458effc3452399619b8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:cba5aaffdb783458effc345239961984=Traditional Share^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Copy of Request\Revoke GAF\Other Share Access">cba5eebfdb783458effc34523996193c</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	g_form.setVisible('share_own','false');
	g_form.setVisible('groupW','false');
	g_form.setVisible('group_r','false');
	g_form.setVisible('please_specify_valid_share_path','false');
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
var scat_task=g_form.getValue("sc_task.short_description");
	if((scat_task == 'Provide or revoke share access for Normal Secure') || (scat_task == 'Provision or Revoke share access for Normal secure'))
	{
		g_form.setVisible('share_own','false');
		g_form.setVisible('groupW','false');
		g_form.setVisible('group_r','false');
		g_form.setVisible('please_specify_valid_share_path','false');
	}
	else if (scat_task == 'Traditional Share Request or Revoke : Approval TASK')
	{
		g_form.setVisible('share_own','true');
		g_form.setVisible('groupW','true');
		g_form.setVisible('group_r','true');
		g_form.setMandatory('share_own',true);
		g_form.setVisible('please_specify_valid_share_path','false');
	}
	else if (scat_task == 'Share path is not available in CMDB: Approval task')
	{
		g_form.setVisible('share_own','true');
		g_form.setVisible('groupW','true');
		g_form.setVisible('group_r','true');
		g_form.setVisible('please_specify_valid_share_path','true');
		g_form.setMandatory('please_specify_valid_share_path',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('share_own',true);
	}
		//confirm('test' + scat_task);
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>only_for_ctask</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nxf52093</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>63a5eaffdb783458effc3452399619b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>only_for_ctask</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation" source="x_nxps3_nxp_gaf_sh">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_63a5eaffdb783458effc3452399619b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nxf52093</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
